posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott

All Sold





[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=210198&d=1446320706[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=210197&d=1446320671[/IMG]

Email sent on Jordan, Bescher, and Chase (white cap).

And I'm kind of pondering one of the cards you just posted to your eBay, too...
Email sent earlier on Cicotte and Gandil

Email sent a while back on Chase dark cap.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Email sent on Stephens – Sov. 350!

Thanks,
Scott

Wow, didn't realize I had these priced so well :rolleyes:

Just to let the many people who emailed me about Goode.  The first email I got was at 3:52 pm.  Five minutes is not a BST record, but Goode ;)
Sold cards removed, others drop in price, thanks, Scott :rolleyes:

Got Bescher, Violat and co.

Thanks.
